text: The first season of Naruto is directed by Hayato Date. It is based on Masashi Kishimoto's manga series. The season follows Naruto Uzumaki living in the Hidden leaf village determined to become the next Hogake and gain the respect of the villagers. In Japan, the season released in both VHS and DVD format. A total of twelve volumes were released by Sony Pictures entertainment between January 1 and December 3,2003. ==Episode list== Category:Naruto
title: Naruto (season 1)
